extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected Systems and Versions
extracted_playbook.description: Determine if the systems are running any of the affected SAP products and versions.

extracted_playbook.condition: Are the systems affected by any of the listed CVEs?

extracted_playbook.title: Apply Security Fixes for Critical Vulnerabilities
extracted_playbook.description: Apply the security fixes for the critical vulnerabilities CVE-2023-27497, CVE-2023-27267, CVE-2022-41272, CVE-2023-28765, and CVE-2023-27269.

extracted_playbook.title: Apply Additional Security Patches
extracted_playbook.description: Apply the other 19 security patches recommended by CERT-EU.

affected_products: SAP Diagnostics Agent (OSCommand Bridge and EventLogServiceCollector) version 720
SAP BusinessObjects Business Intelligence Platform (Promotion Management) versions 420, 430
SAP NetWeaver Application Server for ABAP and ABAP Platform versions 700, 701, 702, 731, 740, 750, 751, 752, 753, 754, 755, 756, 757, 791
